notes.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
notes.p: This trial is fully approved by the Data Protection Agency: P-2019-637. The trial is exempt from approval by the National Committee on Health Ethics Research ( http://en.nvk.dk/how-to-notify/what-to-notify) as surveys using questionnaires and interviews that do not involve human biological material (section 14 (2) of the Committee Act) research projects, not including biological material do not need the approval of the research ethics committee system and has received an exemption number: H-19087506.
The trial is registered at ClinicalTrials.gov NCT04204109.

Participants will be informed that they consent to participate when answering the REDcap questionnaires. Participants will be informed that they can withdraw their consent and discontinue their participation at any time.
